2997  */
2998 	return {
2999 	    /**
3000 	     * @return id of this bundle
3001 	     * @type Number
3002 	     */
3003 	    id : _id,
3004 	    /**
3005          * @return id of this bundle
3006          * @type Number
3007          */
3008 	    getId : function() {return _id; },
3009 		toString : function() {return _bundle.toString();},
3010 		/**
3011 		 * returns Bundle destinations based on query params
3012 		 *
3013 		 * @function
3014 		 * @param {Object}params - filter
3015 		 * See BundleResourceDeploymentCriteria class for available params
3016 		 * There are also shortcuts for ENUM parameters: - you can use
3017 		 * <ul>
3018 		 *    <li>{status:"success"} insetead of {BundleDeploymentStatus:"BundleDeploymentStatus.SUCCESS"}</li>
3019 		 *  </ul>
3020 		 * @type Bundle-Destination[]
3021 		 */
3022     destinations : _destinations,
3023 		/**
3024 		 * returns Bundle versions based on query params
3025 		 *
3026 		 * @function
3027 		 * @param {Object} params - filter
3028 		 * See BundleVersionCriteria class for available params
3029 		 * @type Bundle-Version[]
3030 		 */
3031 		versions : _versions,
3032     /**
3033 	 * deploys this bundle
3034 	 *
3035 	 * @param {Bundle-Destination} destination - destination to be deployed to
3036 	 * @param {Object} params - map of input parameters required by bundle
3037 	 * @param {Bundle-Version|String} version - bundle version to be deployed, if null, latest version is used
3038 	 * @param {Boolean} isClean - whether to perform clean deployment or not, default is true
3039 	 * @type Bundle-Deployment
3040 	 */
3041 		deploy : function(destination,params,version,isClean) {
3042 			params = params || {};
3043 			if (typeof(isClean) == "undefined") {
3044 			    isClean = true;
3045 			}
3046 			var versionStr; // detect version argument and properly print it
3047 			if (typeof(version) == "string") {
3048 				versionStr = version;
3049 			}
3050 			else if (version != null && typeof(version) == "object") {
3051 				versionStr = version.obj;
3052 			}
3053 			common.trace("Bundle("+_id+").deploy(destination="+common.objToString(destination)+",params="+common.objToString(params)+",version="+versionStr+")");
3054 			if (version==null) {
3055 				common.info("Param version is null, will use latest version of bundle");
3056 				var criteria = common.createCriteria(new BundleCriteria(),{id:_id});
3057 				var ver = BundleManager.findBundlesWithLatestVersionCompositesByCriteria(criteria).get(0).latestVersion;
3058 				version = _versions({bundleId:_id,version:ver})[0];
3059 			}
3060 			if (typeof(version) == "string") {
3061 				var versions = _versions({bundleId:_id,version:version});
3062 				if (version.length==0) {
3063 					throw "Param version ["+version+"] is invalid for this bundle - no such version";
3064 				}
3065 				version = versions[0];
3066 			}
3067 			// we need to fetch version object with configuration definition
3068 			var criteria = common.createCriteria(new BundleVersionCriteria(),{id:version.id});
3069 			criteria.fetchConfigurationDefinition(true);
3070 			version.obj = BundleManager.findBundleVersionsByCriteria(criteria).get(0);
3071 			var configuration = new Configuration();
3072 			// so if the bundle has come configuration, we create default
3073 			// instance of it and apply our param values
3074 			if (version.obj.configurationDefinition.defaultTemplate!=null) {
3075 				var defaultConfig = version.obj.configurationDefinition.defaultTemplate.createConfiguration();
3076 				configuration = common.applyConfiguration(defaultConfig,version.obj.configurationDefinition,params);
3077 			}
3078 			var deployment = BundleManager.createBundleDeployment(version.obj.id, destination.id, "", configuration);
3079 			deployment = BundleManager.scheduleBundleDeployment(deployment.id, isClean);
3080 			var func = function() {
3081 				var crit = common.createCriteria(new BundleDeploymentCriteria(),{id:deployment.id});
3082 		        var result = BundleManager.findBundleDeploymentsByCriteria(crit);
3083 		        if (!result.isEmpty()) {
3084 		        	result = result.get(0);
3085 		        	if (!(result.status == BundleDeploymentStatus.PENDING || result.status == BundleDeploymentStatus.IN_PROGRESS)) {
3086 		        		return result;
3087 		        	}
3088 		        }
3089 			};
3090 			var deployment = common.waitFor(func);
3091 			if (deployment) {
3092 				common.info("Bundle deployment finished with status : "+deployment.status);
3093 				return new Deployment(deployment);
3094 			}
3095 			throw "Bundle deployment error";
3096 		},
3097     /**
3098 	 * creates a Bundle destination
3099 	 *
3100 	 * @param {ResGroup} group - must be COMPATIBLE and must contain resources supporting Bundle deployment
3101 	 * @param {String} name of new destination, if null, name is taken from group
3102 	 * @param {String} target - directory or path relative to `baseName` - if null,
3103 	 * default is taken (this default defines ResourceType - so it will be based on baseName)
3104 	 * @param {String} baseName - name of property found in group's ResourceType will
3105 	 * be used as base when constructing target deploy directory - can be null when
3106 	 * group's ResourceType defines exactly 1 baseName
3107 	 * @type Bundle-Destination
3108 	 */
3109 		createDestination : function(group,name,target,baseName) {
3110 			common.trace("Bundle("+_id+").createDestination(group="+group+",name="+name+",target="+target+",baseName="+baseName+")");
3111 			if (group==null) {
3112 				throw "Resource group param cannot be null";
3113 			}
3114 			// check whether we can deploy bundles to this group
3115 			var g = groups.find({id:group.getId(),bundleTargetableOnly:true});
3116 			if (g.length==0) {
3117 				throw "Given resource group must contains only resources able to deploy bundles";
3118 			}
3119 			if (name==null) {
3120 				name = group.obj.name;
3121 				common.debug("Destination name is null, using group name ["+name+"] as name");
3122 			}
3123 			// wheck for valid baseName
3124 			var criteria = common.createCriteria(new ResourceTypeCriteria(),{id:group.obj.resourceType.id});
3125 			criteria.fetchBundleConfiguration(true);
3126 			var resType = ResourceTypeManager.findResourceTypesByCriteria(criteria).get(0);
3127 			var baseNames = {};
3128 			var names = "";
3129 			var iterator = resType.resourceTypeBundleConfiguration.bundleDestinationBaseDirectories.iterator();
3130 			while(iterator.hasNext()) {
3131 				var dest = iterator.next();
3132 				baseNames[dest.name] = dest.valueName;
3133 				names+=dest.name+", ";
3134 			}
3135 			var size = resType.resourceTypeBundleConfiguration.bundleDestinationBaseDirectories.size();
3136 			if (size>1) {
3137 				if (baseName==null) {
3138 					throw "baseName parameter must NOT be null, because resource type for given group defines more than 1 baseNames ["+names+"]";
3139 				}
3140 
3141 			}
3142 			if (baseName==null) {
3143 				baseName = resType.resourceTypeBundleConfiguration.bundleDestinationBaseDirectories.iterator().next().name;
3144 				common.info("Parameter baseName was not passed, using default : " +baseName)
3145 			}
3146 			if (typeof(baseNames[baseName]) == "undefined") {
3147 				throw "Invalid baseName parameter, valid for given resource group are ["+names+"]";
3148 			}
3149 			if (target==null) {
3150 				target = baseNames[baseName];
3151 				common.info("Parameter target was not passed, using default : "+target);
3152 			}
3153 			// check for destinations having same target on same group
3154 			_destinations({groupId:group.getId()}).forEach(function(d) {
3155 				if (d.obj.destinationBaseDirectoryName==baseName && d.obj.deployDir == target) {
3156 					throw "Destination under given group with given baseName and target already exists";
3157 				}
3158 			});
3159 			var bundleDestination = BundleManager.createBundleDestination(_id,name, "", baseName, target, group.getId());
3160 			return Destination(bundleDestination);
3161 		},
3162 		/**
3163 		 * removes this bundle from server
3164 		 */
3165 		remove : function() {
3166 			common.trace("Bundle("+_id+").remove()");
3167 			BundleManager.deleteBundle(_id);
3168 		}
3169 	};
3170 
3171 };

3173 /**
3174  * @namespace provides access to resources in inventory
3175  */
3176 var resources = (function () {
3177 	var common = new _common();
3178 	return {
3179 		/**
3180 		 * creates ResourceCriteria object based on filter
3181 		 *
3182 		 * @param {Object} params - query params
3183 		 * @ignore
3184 		 */
3185     createCriteria : function(params) {
3186 			params = params || {};
3187 			common.trace("resources.createCriteria("+common.objToString(params) +")");
3188 			var criteria = common.createCriteria(new ResourceCriteria(),params,function(key,value) {
3189 				if (key=="status") {
3190 		    		 return "addFilterInventoryStatus(InventoryStatus."+value.toUpperCase()+")";
3191 		    	}
3192 		    	if (key=="category") {
3193 		    		return "addFilterResourceCategories(ResourceCategory."+value.toUpperCase()+")";
3194 		    	}
3195 		    	if (key=="availability") {
3196 		    		return "addFilterCurrentAvailability(AvailabilityType."+value.toUpperCase()+")";
3197 		    	}
3198 		    	if (key=="type") {
3199 		    		return "addFilterResourceTypeName(\""+value+"\")";
3200 		    	}
3201 		    	if (key=="key") {
3202 		    		return "addFilterResourceKey(\""+value+"\")";
3203 		    	}
3204 			});
3205 			// by default only 200 items are returned, this line discards it ..
3206 			// so we get unlimited list
3207 			criteria.clearPaging();
3208 			return criteria;
3209 		},
3210 		/**
3211 		 * finds resources in inventory
3212 		 *
3213 		 * @param {Object} params - see ResourceCriteria.addFilter[param] methods for available params.
3214 		 * There are also shortcuts for ENUM parameters: - you can use
3215 		 * <ul>
3216 		 *    <li>{status:"new"} insetead of {InventoryStatus:"InventoryStatus.NEW"}</li>
3217 		 *    <li>{category:"platform"} instead of {ResourceCategory:"ResourceCategory.PLATTFORM"}</li>
3218 		 *    <li>{availability:"up"} instead of {AvailabilityType:"AvailabilityType.UP}</li>
3219 		 *    <li>{type:"RHQ Agent"} instead of {resourceTypeName:"RHQ Agent"}</li>
3220 		 *  </ul>
3221 		 * @example resources.find({type:"RHQ Agent",name:"RHQ Agent",availability:"down"});
3222 		 * @example resources.find({type:"JBoss AS7 Standalone Server",parentResourceId:12345});
3223 		 * @returns array of resources
3224 		 * @type Resource[]
3225 		 */
3226 		find : function(params) {
3227 			params = params || {};
3228 			common.trace("resources.find("+common.objToString(params)+")");
3229 			params.status="COMMITTED";
3230 			var criteria = resources.createCriteria(params);
3231 			var res = ResourceManager.findResourcesByCriteria(criteria);
3232 			common.debug("Found "+res.size()+" resources ");
3233 		    return common.pageListToArray(res).map(function(x){return new Resource(x);});
3234 		},

3244 			return resources.find(params);
3245 		},

3250 		 */
3251 		platform : function(params) {

3463 		var _param = param;
3464 		var _res = res;
3465 		var _getMDef = function(){
3466 			var criteria = common.createCriteria(new MeasurementDefinitionCriteria(),{resourceTypeId:_res.resourceType.id,displayName:_param.name});				
3467 			var mDefs = MeasurementDefinitionManager.findMeasurementDefinitionsByCriteria(criteria);
3468 			
3469 			var index = -1
3470 			for (i=0;i<mDefs.size();i++) {
3471 				if (mDefs.get(i).displayName == _param.name) {
3472 					index = i;
3473 					break;
3474 				}
3475 			}
3476 			if (index == -1) {
3477 				throw "Unable to retrieve measurement definition, this is a bug"
3478 			}
3479 			return mDefs.get(index);
3480 		};
3481 		var _getSchedule = function(){
3482 			var mDefId = _getMDef().id;
3483 			common.trace("Retrieving schedules for resource with id: " +_res.id + 
3484 					" and measurement definition id: " +mDefId);
3485 			var criteria = common.createCriteria(new MeasurementScheduleCriteria(),
3486 					{resourceId:_res.id,definitionIds:[mDefId]});				
3487 			var schedules = MeasurementScheduleManager.findSchedulesByCriteria(criteria);
3488 			
3489 			if(schedules.size()==0){
3490 				throw "Unable to retrive schedule for this Metric!!";
3491 			}
3492 			if(schedules.size()>1){
3493 				throw "Retrived multiple schedules for this Metric!!";
3494 			}			
3495 			return schedules.get(0);
3496 		};

3581   /**

3588 	  common.trace("Resource("+_id+").getCallTimes(beginTime="+beginTime+",endTime="+endTime+")");

3596 				return {callDestination:x.callDestination, average:x.average, total:x.total, minimum:x.minimum, maximum:x.maximum, count: x.count};

3600 	  throw "No CALLTIME Schedule found for this resource"

3695 	var _waitForOperationResult = function(resOpShedule){
3696 		var opHistCriteria = new ResourceOperationHistoryCriteria();
3697 		if(resOpShedule)
3698 			opHistCriteria.addFilterJobId(resOpShedule.getJobId());
3699 		opHistCriteria.addFilterResourceIds(_id);
3700 		opHistCriteria.addSortStartTime(PageOrdering.DESC); // put most recent
3701 															// at top of results
3702 		opHistCriteria.clearPaging();
3703 		opHistCriteria.fetchResults(true);
3704 		var pred = function() {
3705 			var histories = OperationManager.findResourceOperationHistoriesByCriteria(opHistCriteria);
3706 			if (histories.size() > 0) {
3707 				if (histories.get(0).getStatus() != OperationRequestStatus.INPROGRESS) {
3708 					return histories.get(0);
3709 				}
3710 				common.debug("Operation in progress..");
3711 			};
3712 		};
3713 		common.debug("Waiting for result..");
3714 		sleep(3000); // trying to workaround https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=855674
3715 		var history = common.waitFor(pred);
3716 		if (!history) {
3717 			// timed out
3718 			var histories = OperationManager.findResourceOperationHistoriesByCriteria(opHistCriteria);
3719 			if (histories.size() > 0) {
3720 				history = histories.get(0);
3721 			}
3722 			else {
3723 				throw "ERROR Cannot get operation history result remote API ERROR?";
3724 			}
3725 		}
3726 		common.debug("Operation finished with status : "+history.status);
3727 		return history;
3728 	};
3729 	var _checkRequiredConfigurationParams = function(configDef,params) {
3730 		if (!configDef) {
3731 			return;
3732 		}
3733 		params = params || {};
3734 		// check whether required params are defined
3735 		var iter = configDef.getPropertyDefinitions().values().iterator();
3736 		while(iter.hasNext()) {
3737 			var propDef = iter.next();
3738 			if (propDef.isRequired() && !params[propDef.name]) {
3739 				throw "Property ["+propDef.name+"] is required";
3740 			}
3741 		}
3742 	};
3743 	var _checkOperationName = function(name){
3744 		// let's obtain operation definitions, so we can check operation name
3745 		var criteria = new ResourceTypeCriteria();
3746 		criteria.addFilterId(_find().get(0).resourceType.id);
3747 		criteria.fetchOperationDefinitions(true);
3748 		var resType = ResourceTypeManager.findResourceTypesByCriteria(criteria).get(0);
3749 		var iter = resType.operationDefinitions.iterator();
3750 		// we put op names here in case invalid name is called
3751 		var ops="";
3752 		while(iter.hasNext()) {
3753 			var operationDefinition = iter.next();
3754 			ops+=operationDefinition.name+", ";
3755 			if (name==operationDefinition.name) {
3756 				return operationDefinition;	
3757 			}
3758 		}
3759 		throw "Operation name ["+name+"] is invalid for this resource, valid operation names are : " + ops;	
3760 	};
3761 	var _createOperationConfig = function(params, operationDefinition){
3762 		var configuration = null;
3763 		if (params || params == {}) {
3764 			configuration = common.hashAsConfiguration(params);
3765 		}
3766 		else if (operationDefinition.parametersConfigurationDefinition){
3767 			var template = operationDefinition.parametersConfigurationDefinition.defaultTemplate;
3768 			common.trace("Default template for parameters configuration definition" + template);
3769 			if (template) {
3770 				configuration = template.createConfiguration();
3771 			}
3772 		}
3773 		// if (configuration)
3774 		// pretty.print(configuration);
3775 		// println(common.objToString(common.configurationAsHash(configuration)));
3776 		
3777 		return configuration;
3778 	}

3872 		/**
3873 		 * removes/deletes this resource from inventory.
3874 		 *
3875 		 * @returns true if resource no longer exists in inventory, false
3876 		 *          otherwise
3877 		 * @type Boolean
3878 		 */
3879 		remove : function() {
3880 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").remove()");
3881 			if (!_exists()) {
3882 				common.debug("Resource does not exists, nothing to remove");
3883 				return false;
3884 			}
3885 			var parent = _parent();
3886 			if (!parent) {
3887 				throw "Resource cannot be deleted without having parent";
3888 			}
3889 			var startTime = new Date().getTime();
3890 			var parentId = parent.getId();
3891 			try {
3892 				var history = ResourceFactoryManager.deleteResource(_id);
3893 			}
3894 			catch (exc) {
3895 				common.info("Resource was not deleted :"+exc);
3896 				return false;
3897 			}
3898 			var pageControl = new PageControl(0,1);
3899 			var pred = function() {
3900 				var histories = ResourceFactoryManager.findDeleteChildResourceHistory(parentId,startTime,new Date().getTime(),pageControl);
3901 				var current;
3902 				common.pageListToArray(histories).forEach(
3903 						function (x) {
3904 							if (x.id==history.id) {
3905 								if (x.status != DeleteResourceStatus.IN_PROGRESS) {
3906 									current = x;
3907 									return;
3908 								}
3909 								common.info("Waiting for resource to be removed");
3910 							}
3911 						}
3912 				);
3913 				return current;
3914 			};
3915 			var result = common.waitFor(pred);
3916 			if (result) {
3917 				common.debug("Resource deletion finished with status : "+result.status);
3918 			}
3919 			if (result && result.status == DeleteResourceStatus.SUCCESS) {
3920 				common.debug("Resource was removed from inventory");
3921 				return true;
3922 			}
3923 			if (!result) {
3924 				common.info("Resource deletion still in progress, giving up...");
3925 				return false;
3926 			}
3927 			common.info("Resource deletion failed, reason : "+result.errorMessage);
3928 			return false;
3929 		},

4119 		/**
4120 		 * creates a new child resource
4121 		 *
4122 		 * @param {Object} params can contain following: -
4123 		 * <ul>
4124 		 * <li>name [String] (required)- name for a new resource child, name is optional when `content` is provided</li>
4125 		 * <li>type [String] (required) - resource type name to be created (exact name, not just filter)</li>
4126 		 * <li>config [Object] (optional) - configuration map for new resource, if not present, default is taken</li>
4127 		 * <li>pluginConfig [Object] (optional) - plugin configuration for new resource, if not present, default is taken (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED)</li>
4128 		 * <li>content [String] (optional) - absolute path for resource's content file (typical for deployments)</li>
4129 		 * <li>version [String] (optional) - version string</li>
4130 		 * @example // create a deployment child on JBoss AS7
4131      * as.createChild({name:"hello.war",type:"Deployment",content:"/tmp/hello.war"});
4132 		 * @example // create a network interface with configuration on JBoss AS7
4133      * as.createChild({name:"testinterface",type:"Network Interface",config:{"inet-address":"127.0.0.1","any-address":false}});
4134      * @returns new resource if it was successfully created and discovered, null otherwise
4135 		 * @type Resource
4136 		 */
4137 		createChild : function(params) {
4138 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").createChild("+common.objToString(params)+")");
4139 			params = params || {};
4140 			if (!params.name && !params.content) {
4141 				throw "Either [name] or [content] parameters must be defined";
4142 			}
4143 			if (!params.type) {
4144 				throw "[type] parameter MUST be specified, how could I guess what type of resource are you creating?";
4145 			}
4146 			// TODO check for existing resource!
4147 			var name=params.name;
4148 			if (!params.name) {
4149 				name = new java.io.File(params.content).getName();
4150 			}
4151 			// bind input params
4152 			var type = params.type;
4153 			var config = params.config;
4154 			var version = params.version || null;
4155 			var content = params.content;
4156 			// these 2 are used for querying resource history
4157 			var startTime = new Date().getTime();
4158 			var pageControl = new PageControl(0,1);
4159 			// we need to obtain resourceType for a new resource
4160 			var selfType = _find().get(0).resourceType;
4161 			var criteria = common.createCriteria(new ResourceTypeCriteria(),{name:type,pluginName:selfType.plugin,parentId:selfType.id,createDeletePolicy:CreateDeletePolicy.BOTH});
4162 			criteria.fetchResourceConfigurationDefinition(true);
4163 			criteria.fetchPluginConfigurationDefinition(true);
4164 			var resTypes = ResourceTypeManager.findResourceTypesByCriteria(criteria);
4165 			var failed = resTypes.size() == 0;
4166 			var resType = null;
4167 			for (var i=0;i<resTypes.size();i++) {
4168 				if (resTypes.get(i).name == type) {
4169 					resType = resTypes.get(i);
4170 					failed = false;
4171 					break;
4172 				}
4173 			}
4174 			if (failed)  {
4175 				criteria = common.createCriteria(new ResourceTypeCriteria(),{pluginName:selfType.plugin,parentId:selfType.id,createDeletePolicy:CreateDeletePolicy.BOTH});
4176 				resTypes = ResourceTypeManager.findResourceTypesByCriteria(criteria);
4177 				var types = "";
4178 				for (var i=0;i<resTypes.size();i++) {
4179 					types+=resTypes.get(i).name+", ";
4180 				}
4181 				throw "Invalid resource type [type="+type+"] valid type names are ["+types+"]";
4182 			}
4183 			var configuration =  new Configuration();
4184 		    if (config) {
4185 		    	configuration = common.hashAsConfiguration(config);
4186 		    }
4187 		    else {
4188 		    	// we should obtain default/empty configuration
4189 		    	common.debug("No configuration passed, using default");
4190 		    	var template = resType.resourceConfigurationDefinition.defaultTemplate;
4191 				if (template) {
4192 					configuration = template.createConfiguration();
4193 				}
4194 		    }
4195 			common.debug("Creating new ["+type+"] resource called [" + name+"] with following configuration: ["
4196 					+ common.objToString(common.configurationAsHash(configuration)) + "]");
4197 			if (content) {
4198 				// we're creating a resource with backing content
4199 				var file = new java.io.File(content);
4200 				if (!file.exists()) {
4201 					throw "content parameter file '" +content+ "' does not exist!";
4202 				}
4203 				if (typeof scriptUtil.uploadContent !== "undefined") {
4204 				    var handle = scriptUtil.uploadContent(content);
4205 				    var history = ResourceFactoryManager.createPackageBackedResourceViaContentHandle(
4206 	                        _id,
4207 	                        resType.id,
4208 	                        name, // new resource name
4209 	                        null, // pluginConfiguration
4210 	                        name,
4211 	                        version, // packageVersion
4212 	                        null, // architectureId
4213 	                        configuration, // resourceConfiguration
4214 	                        handle, // content
4215 	                        null // timeout
4216 	                    );
4217 				}
4218 				else {
4219 				    // keep for compatibility with < JON 3.2
4220     				common.debug("Reading file " + content + " ...");
4221     			    var inputStream = new java.io.FileInputStream(file);
4222     			    var fileLength = file.length();
4223     			    var fileBytes = java.lang.reflect.Array.newInstance(java.lang.Byte.TYPE, fileLength);
4224     			    for (numRead=0, offset=0; ((numRead >= 0) && (offset < fileBytes.length)); offset += numRead ) {
4225     				    numRead = inputStream.read(fileBytes, offset, fileBytes.length - offset);
4226     			    }
4227     
4228     				var history = ResourceFactoryManager.createPackageBackedResource(
4229     					_id,
4230     					resType.id,
4231     					name, // new resource name
4232     					null, // pluginConfiguration
4233     					name,
4234     					version, // packageVersion
4235     					null, // architectureId
4236     					configuration, // resourceConfiguration
4237     					fileBytes, // content
4238     					null // timeout
4239     				);
4240 				}
4241 			}
4242 			else {
4243 				var plugConfiguration = new Configuration();
4244 				var pluginTemplate = resType.pluginConfigurationDefinition.defaultTemplate;
4245 				if (pluginTemplate) {
4246 					plugConfiguration = pluginTemplate.configuration;
4247 				}
4248 				var history = ResourceFactoryManager.createResource(
4249 					_id,
4250 					resType.id,
4251 					name, // new resource name
4252 					plugConfiguration, // pluginConfiguration
4253 					configuration, // resourceConfiguration
4254 					null  // timeout
4255 				);
4256 			}
4257 			var pred = function() {
4258 				var actualDateMilis = new Date().getTime();
4259 				common.trace("Searching for CreateChildResourceHistory. Res id: "+_id+", startTime: "+new Date(startTime)+
4260 						", actualDateMilis: "+new Date(actualDateMilis));
4261 				var histories = ResourceFactoryManager.findCreateChildResourceHistory(_id,startTime,actualDateMilis,pageControl);
4262 				//TODO check this on other relevant parts or use time from server
4263 				if(histories.size() == 0){
4264 					common.warn("No history found inside given range. The cause of this could be that time" +
4265 							" on machine witch CLI client and on machine with RHQ server is not synchronised.");
4266 				}
4267 				var current;
4268 				common.pageListToArray(histories).forEach(
4269 						function (x) {
4270 							if (history && x.id==history.id) {
4271 								if (x.status != CreateResourceStatus.IN_PROGRESS) {
4272 									current = x;
4273 									return;
4274 								}
4275 								common.info("Waiting for resource creation..");
4276 							}
4277 						}
4278 				);
4279 				return current;
4280 			};
4281 			common.debug("Waiting for resrouce creation operation...");
4282 			var result = common.waitFor(pred);
4283 			if (result) {
4284 				common.debug("Child resource creation status : " + result.status);
4285 			}
4286 			else {
4287 				common.info("Child resource creation timed out!!");
4288 				return;
4289 			}
4290 			if (result && result.status == CreateResourceStatus.SUCCESS) {
4291 				common.debug("Waiting for resource to be auto-discovered");
4292 				// we assume there can be exactly one resource of one type
4293 				// having unique name
4294 				var discovered = common.waitFor(function() {return resources.find({parentResourceId:_id,resourceTypeId:resType.id,resourceKey:result.newResourceKey}).length==1;});
4295 				if (!discovered) {
4296 					common.info("Resource child was successfully created, but it's autodiscovery timed out!");
4297 					return;
4298 				}
4299 				else {
4300 					common.info("Resource child was successfully created");
4301 				}
4302 				return resources.find({parentResourceId:_id,resourceTypeId:resType.id,resourceKey:result.newResourceKey})[0];
4303 			}
4304 			common.debug("Resource creation failed, reason : "+result.errorMessage);
4305 			return;
4306

4314 
4315 		},
4316 		/**
4317 		 * invokes operation on resource, operation status is polled 'till
4318 		 * timeout is reached or operation finishes
4319 		 *
4320 		 * @param {String}
4321 		 *            name of operation (required)
4322 		 * @param {Object}
4323 		 *            params - hashmap for operation params (Configuration) (optional)
4324 		 * @type {Object}
4325 		 * @returns javascript object (hashmap) with following keys:
4326 		 * <ul>
4327 		 * <li>status {String} - operation status<li>
4328 		 * <li>error {String} - operation error message</li>
4329 		 * <li>result {Object} -  result configuration</li>
4330 		 * <ul>
4331 		 */
4332 		invokeOperation : function(name,params) {
4333 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").invokeOperation(name="+name+",params={"+common.objToString(params)+"})");
4334 			// let's obtain operation definitions, so we can check operation
4335 			var op = _checkOperationName(name);
4336 			var configuration = _createOperationConfig(params,op);
4337 			_checkRequiredConfigurationParams(op.parametersConfigurationDefinition,common.configurationAsHash(configuration));
4338 
4339 			var resOpShedule = OperationManager.scheduleResourceOperation(_id,name,0,0,0,0,configuration,null);
4340 			common.info("Operation ["+name+"] scheduled");
4341 			var result = _waitForOperationResult(resOpShedule);
4342 			var ret = {}
4343 			ret.status = String(result.status)
4344 			ret.error = String(result.errorMessage)
4345 			ret.result = common.configurationAsHash(result.results,op.resultsConfigurationDefinition);
4346 			return ret;
4347 		},
4348 		/**
4349 		 * schedules operation on resource. In contrast to invokeOperation this is
4350 		 * not blocking (synchronous) operation.
4351 		 *
4352 		 * @param {String}
4353 		 *            name of operation (required)
4354 		 *            
4355 		 * @param {long} delay delay in seconds (required)
4356 		 * @param {long} repeatInterval repeatInterval in seconds (required)
4357 		 * @param {int} repeatCount repeatCount in seconds (required)
4358 		 * @param {Object}
4359 		 *            opParams - hashmap for operation params (Configuration) (optional)
4360 		 */
4361 		scheduleOperation : function(name,delay,repeatInterval,repeatCount,opParams) {
4362 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").scheduleOperation(name="+name+", delay="
4363 					+delay+", repeatInterval="+repeatInterval+", repeatCount="+repeatCount+
4364 					", opParams={"+common.objToString(opParams)+"})");
4365 			if(delay < 0){throw "Delay of scheduled operation must be >= 0 !!!";}
4366 			if(repeatInterval < 0){throw "Repeat interval of scheduled operation must be >= 0 !!!";}
4367 			if(repeatCount < 0){throw "Repeat count of scheduled operation must be >= 0 !!!";}
4368 			
4369 			// let's obtain operation definitions, so we can check operation
4370 			var op = _checkOperationName(name);
4371 			var configuration = _createOperationConfig(opParams,op);
4372 			_checkRequiredConfigurationParams(op.parametersConfigurationDefinition,common.configurationAsHash(configuration));
4373 
4374 			var resOpShedule = OperationManager.scheduleResourceOperation(_id,name,delay * 1000,
4375 					repeatInterval * 1000,repeatCount,0,configuration,null);
4376 			common.info("Operation '"+name+"' scheduled");
4377 		},
4378 		/**
4379 		 * schedules operation on resource using crone expression. In contrast to invokeOperation this is 
4380 		 * not blocking (synchronous) operation.
4381 		 *
4382 		 * @param {String}
4383 		 *            name of operation (required)
4384 		 *            
4385 		 * @param {String} cronExpression (required)
4386 		 * @param {Object}
4387 		 *            opParams - hashmap for operation params (Configuration) (optional)
4388 		 */
4389 		scheduleOperationUsingCron : function(name,cronExpression,opParams) {
4390 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").scheduleOperationUsingCron(name="+name+", cronExpression="+cronExpression+
4391 					", opParams={"+common.objToString(opParams)+"})");
4392 			
4393 			// let's obtain operation definitions, so we can check operation
4394 			var op = _checkOperationName(name);
4395 			var configuration = _createOperationConfig(opParams,op);
4396 			_checkRequiredConfigurationParams(op.parametersConfigurationDefinition,common.configurationAsHash(configuration));
4397 			
4398 			var resOpShedule = OperationManager.scheduleResourceOperationUsingCron(_id,name,cronExpression,0,configuration,null);
4399 			common.info("Operation '"+name+"' scheduled");
4400 		},
4401 		/**
4402 		 * Waits until operation is finished or timeout is reached.
4403 		 *
4404 		 * @param resOpShedule
4405 		 *            may be null, than the most recent job for this resource
4406 		 *            is picked
4407 		 * @returns operation history
4408 		 * @function
4409 		 */
4410 		waitForOperationResult : _waitForOperationResult,
4411 		/**
4412 		 * Checks that given operation with given parameters is valid on this resource.
4413 		 * Default parameters are used when ommited.
4414 		 *
4415 		 * @param {String}
4416 		 *            name of operation (required)
4417 		 *            
4418 		 * @param {Object}
4419 		 *            opParams - hashmap for operation params (Configuration) (optional)
4420 		 * @returns checked configuration
4421 		 */
4422 		checkOperation : function(name, opParams){
4423 			var op = _checkOperationName(name);
4424 			var configuration = _createOperationConfig(opParams,op);
4425 			var confAsHash = common.configurationAsHash(configuration);
4426 			_checkRequiredConfigurationParams(op.parametersConfigurationDefinition,confAsHash);
4427 			return confAsHash;
4428 		},
4429 		/**
4430 		 * checks whether resource exists in inventory
4431 		 *
4432 		 * @returns bool
4433 		 * @type Boolean
4434 		 */
4435 		exists : function() {
4436 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").exists()");
4437 			return _exists();
4438 		},
4439 		/**
4440 		 * returns true if availability == UP
4441 		 *
4442 		 * @function
4443 		 * @type Boolean
4444 		 */
4445 		isAvailable : _isAvailable,
4446 		/**
4447 		 * wait's until resource becomes UP or timeout is reached
4448 		 *
4449 		 * @returns true if resource became or is available, false otherwise
4450 		 * @type Boolean
4451 		 */
4452 		waitForAvailable : function() {
4453 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").waitForAvailable()");
4454 			return common.waitFor(function() {
4455 				if (!_isAvailable()) {
4456 					common.info("Waiting for resource availability=UP");
4457 				} else { return true; }
4458 			});
4459 		},
4460 		/**
4461 		 * wait's until resource becomes DOWN or timeout is reached
4462 		 *
4463 		 * @returns true if resource became or is DOWN, false otherwise
4464 		 * @type Boolean
4465 		 */
4466 		waitForNotAvailable : function() {
4467 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").waitForNotAvailable()");
4468 			return common.waitFor(function() {
4469 				if (_isAvailable()) {
4470 					common.debug("Waiting for resource availability=DOWN");
4471 				} else { return true; }
4472 			});
4473 		},
4474 		/**
4475 		 * unimports resource
4476 		 *
4477 		 * @returns true if resource is dos no longer exist in inventory, false
4478 		 *          otherwise
4479 		 * @type Boolean
4480 		 */
4481 		uninventory : function() {
4482 			common.trace("Resource("+_id+").uninventory()");
4483 			
4484 			// this is a workaround for https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=830158
4485 			var result = common.waitFor(function (){
4486 				try{
4487 					ResourceManager.uninventoryResources([_id]);
4488 					return true;
4489 				}catch(err){
4490 					var errMsg = err.message;
4491 					common.warn("Caught following error during uninventory: " + errMsg);
4492 					if(errMsg.indexOf("Failed to uninventory platform. " +
4493 							"This can happen if new resources were actively being imported. " +
4494 							"Please wait and try again shortly") != -1){
4495 						return false;
4496 					}else{
4497 						return -1;
4498 					}
4499 				}
4500 			},20,480);
4501 			
4502 			if(!result || result == -1){
4503 				throw "Failed to uninventory. See previous errors."
4504 			}
4505 			
4506 			
4507 			result = common.waitFor(function () {
4508 					if (_find().size()>0) {
4509 						common.debug("Waiting for resource to be removed from inventory");
4510 						return false;
4511 					}
4512 					else {
4513 						return true;
4514 					}
4515 				}
4516 			);
4517 			common.debug("Waiting 5s for sync..");
4518 			sleep(5*1000);
4519 			if (result) {
4520 				common.info("Resource was removed from inventory");
4521 			}
4522 			return result;
4523 		}
4524 	};
4525 
4526 	// merge dynamic methods into static ones
4527 	for (_k in _dynamic) {
4528 		_static[_k] = _dynamic[_k];
4529 	}
4530 	return _static;
4531 };

4535 /**
4536  * @lends _global_
4537  */
4538 var Inventory = resources;
4539 Inventory.discoveryQueue = discoveryQueue;
4540 
4541 /**
4542  * verbosity, default 0 (-2=ERROR, -1=WARN, 0=INFO, 1=DEBUG, 2=TRACE)
4543  */
4544 var verbose = 0;
4545 /**
4546  * poll interval for any waiting in seconds
4547  */
4548 var delay = 5;
4549 /**
4550  * total timeout of any waiting in seconds
4551  */
4552 var timeout = 360;
4553 
4554 /**
4555  *  initializes verbosity and timeouts
4556  *  @param verb - verbosity
4557  *  @param dlay - delay
4558  *  @param tout - total timeout
4559  */
4560 initialize = function(verb,dlay,tout) {
4561 		verbose = verb;
4562 		delay = dlay;
4563 		timeout = tout;
4564 		println("rhqapi initialized: verbose="+verb+" delay="+dlay+"s timeout="+tout+"s");
4565 	}

4571     exports.bundleGroups = bundleGroups;
4572 	exports.groups = groups;
4573 	exports.Resource = Resource;
4574 	exports.roles = roles;
4575 	exports.users = users;
4576 	exports.permissions = permissions;
4577 	exports.alertDefinitions = alertDefinitions;
4578 	exports.dynaGroupDefinitions = dynaGroupDefinitions;
4579   exports.initialize = initialize;
4580 }
